translations: （军队的）团；（尤指有组织的）大批，大群（人或物）；<古>统治，管辖
严格控制，管辖（人及其行为）；把……编成团

sentences.sentence: We were part of an entire regiment that had nothing else to do but to keep that motorway open.
sentences.translation: 我们是整个团的一部分，这个团无其他任务,只是保证公路畅通。
他开小差逃离他所在的团。

sentences.sentence: The 5th Regiment bore down on the enemy positions.
sentences.translation: 第五团向敌人阵地压过去。
